ygData.subject: Stun spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, I m 25 at the moment, and up until recently Whirl Until You Hurl has been great, stopping the mobs in their tracks for a while, long enough to get a
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all,
I'm 25 at the moment, and up until recently Whirl Until You Hurl has been
great, stopping the mobs in their tracks for a while, long enough to get a
few hits in... but now it's only lasting 2 - 10 seconds on avaerage (on
Gnolls at the spires in SK, which con white-red to me).
Is there an upgrade to this spell, or anything similar available that I've
missed? I cant see any other spell that does similar for higher lvl's...
Root is an even lower lvl than this so I presume that's going to be even
less useful.
Thanks :o)

--
Tommy MacDonald ~ ICQ: 1532951
